title: Sexy Berkeley
description: A long-distance relationship with a hot American businessman is the last thing on Beatrice Hart's mind when the day from hell ends with her drink-booking a last minute escape to glamorous Southern California.With Bea's firm belief that long distance never works, will she ever consider that that an exhilarating introduction at 35,000 feet could lead to anything more than a steamy holiday romance?Daniel Berkeley is the irresistible, delectable, smoking hot bachelor, determined to make it happen.
author: Dani Lovell
